website_summaries.verdict: This German-made model is an excellent choice for the kitchen.
cons: Small tank goes through butane fast

customer_reviews.title: Rosle changed this torch a few years ago, is crap now
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought this same model Rosle torch from a kitchen store several years ago and it was the absolute best hand torch I had ever used. The build quality of all the parts of the torch were impeccable and it never had problems igniting even after years of frequent usage. More recently, I bought 2 of these torches from Amazon as gifts to friends only to discover that Rosle had either changed the design or switched manufacturers to a noticeably cheaper quality. The safety switch is poorly built and will fail easily, and the spark is not reliable after seasoned use. Do not buy this torch unless you can find the older version (not made in China)
customer_reviews.author: Frank K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing warranty, but mine is only *halfway* broken.
customer_reviews.text: This thing never feels like it wants to be filled all the way, and it fails on at least half its ingnitions, so I have to sit there resetting the child lock and try to get it to work again. It has been like this since its second fill and has only seen very light use. Really wish I'd bought something cheaper if it's going to be like this.
customer_reviews.author: Age

customer_reviews.title: Leaked gas and replacement had defective ignitor.
customer_reviews.text: This is not of the quality they claim. Maybe the old ones are good, but these new ones are cheap and fail. My first one- all the gas leaked out of it in a few days. I went to use it a second time and there was no gas in it - after filling it with an entire bottle of butane. Got it replaced and the new one had a broken igniter so I needed a second fire-starter to ignite the torch. I returned them both. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like it, works as expected. However, it was used. When the torch arrived, I could see browning on the ceramic ring where the flame exits. And, when I tried to fill the butane canister, it was already full! I appreciate the butane, but don't appreciate being sold a used product claimed to be new.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Baker

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to ignite
customer_reviews.text: I use this for so many things in the kitchen, melting cheese, browning casserole tops, browning crumbs, the list goes on. It is easy to ignite, holds a good flame, easy to operate. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Islander

customer_reviews.title: Rosle Kitchen Torch
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a couple of smaller torches with this unit. Nice product. Feel good in the hand, and quite well-made. I still use my larger torch to brown the meats I do Sous VIde, but this torch is great for smaller items and Crème brûlée. Pricey, but saved some dollars purchasing on Amazon Warehouse Deals.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Use and Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The fuel filling procedure is extremely difficult to get fuel into the tank. And once there's fuel in it (completely full) the full flame is sufficient to melt the sugar on a creme brulee. Am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Ignitor will permanently fail after several uses.
customer_reviews.text: 363 days from the date of purchase (and used only 10 times) and the ignitor refuses to work anymore. I now have to hold the flow of butane in the flames of my gas stove in order to get the torch to flame up. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marco J. DeConno

customer_reviews.title: Great Torch
customer_reviews.text: In all honestly I don't have much experience with other kitchen torches... I've only ever used a hardware store blowtorch in the past. That said. I love this little guy. Perfect for touching up pan seared meat and fish or putting a nice crust on something. Sous-vide or standard cooking is much nicer and much more fun to finish. Doesn't seem to use much fuel either.
customer_reviews.author: gNerdLabs

customer_reviews.title: useful for burning all sorts of foods and lighting cigarettes
customer_reviews.text: Well made item, useful for burning all sorts of foods and lighting cigarettes.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's just a kitchen torch, or is ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's just a kitchen torch, or is it? It is very well made and carries a, wait for it, TEN YEAR WARRANTY! Now that's confidence in your engineering and quality. Buy it if you are considering it!
customer_reviews.author: Lupo Roma

customer_reviews.title: Newbie torch user
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Used it for creme brûlée and searing steak. Be aware that this may hold fewer oz than the can of butane fuel that have. Don’t overfill like I did! Newbie mistake
customer_reviews.author: Anonymou s

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for brother-in-law. Read the reviews and picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: NMHN04

customer_reviews.title: Gobs of heat
customer_reviews.text: This torch is great. We have gone through 3 different torches already and this one seems like it will really last. It's sturdy, puts out high heat and is comfortable to handle. The tank seems to hold a good deal of fuel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Safety Switch
customer_reviews.text: Safety switch is a little awkward to use and you have to reset it every time the ignition is pressed. Other than that, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome torch
customer_reviews.text: works great, use it for dabs, and making creme brulee, works perfect everytime i need it, goes through butane pretty quick if you have it turned up to high.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Great torch
customer_reviews.text: I was always skeptical about these small torches after having tried a few but this one really works well. Neat design and well worth having in your kitchen equipment. It certainly surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great for finishing suis vide cuts, melting cheese, I even reheat pizza with it. Seems like I have to refill it a lot , and the safety is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Scottio

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Tried many others and this one is the best hands down!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward B.

customer_reviews.title: I got this for Christmas and love it. It's easy to use and doesn't take ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas and love it. It's easy to use and doesn't take up a lot of space in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: and it didn't disappoint. Four of us had fun trying it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this torch to make creme brûlée for Christmas, and it didn't disappoint. Four of us had fun trying it. It was a little scary because it burns so hot, but it seems very safe if you use it right. I'd like to find other uses to make it a worthwhile purchase given the cost, though. I need to find more recipes!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness these things are still being made! My old one (10 yrs old) finally bit the dust. One if the few not made in China!
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy to Operate
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I Love it! Only wish I have is that it had a gauge till let you know the fuel is running low.
customer_reviews.author: Rannie

customer_reviews.title: this thing is great! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: From making creme brulee to lighting a cigar when a lighter isn't handy, this thing is great! Sturdy, don't have to refill that often etc.
customer_reviews.author: j. andrew kenney

customer_reviews.title: hottest torch around
customer_reviews.text: I use torches daily and I had about had it with them not being built to last. I decided to try this last one due to it's german engineering (I believe). It did not disappoint. I have had it a couple months now and it works like a charm. Lights every time and it hot as can be.
customer_reviews.author: why

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: have been using this torch for over a month, its been the best one i could find on amazon. the clicker works much better than the other torches and its more solid. love it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and stores well. Great for Creme Brûlée
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Posegate II

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and weight! Easy to handle and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: When I find the perfect tool or gadget or electronic gizmo I get super excited. I do not give this torch five stars lightly. This torch is a friggin' masterpiece in both form and function. I use it regularly and it performs beautifully. I reccomend a high end 5x refined butane for a torch of this quality to increase the life of the torch tips and internal components.
customer_reviews.author: Carlncali

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by the quality of work Rosle's kitchen torch produced. I would recommend this product to everyone of my friends! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cline

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: It works well but I should have listened to someone who said just buy a torch at a hardware store. Uses up the cartridges fast and it's a little annoying to hold and operate. It does work fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Zirlin

customer_reviews.title: Was the perfect gift for my roommate who loves cooking and baking
customer_reviews.text: Was the perfect gift for my roommate who loves cooking and baking! We made delicious crème brûlée with this, and it works like a charm! Easy to store, and the automatic safety feature is GREAT. No worries at all! I would easily recommend this product to anyone interested.
customer_reviews.author: katherine. x

customer_reviews.title: Sous Vide companion
customer_reviews.text: An excellent companion to my new Sous Vide Supreme. A really reliable tool for the kitchen. Just finish the cooking with a burst from the torch and your Sous Vide steak is a winner. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tumut

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This product cannot make crispy or crunchy on the surface of meat, fish or poultry.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: If this product had arrived with ANY instructions I would probably have given it five stars. It does what it's supposed to do for Creme Brulee. It does seem to use a lot of gas (remember that it doesn't come with any butane in it) but I might be doing something wrong since I have NO INSTRUCTIONS. The company has not responded my my email request for instructions...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen DH

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT come with fuel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this torch to make crème brûlée, assuming--perhaps naively--that it would be fully functional on arrival. After fiddling with it for half an hour, I realized I had to independently purchase the butane (pictured). While I understand that it may be dangerous to ship the torch already filled, this was not prominently disclosed. It seems to me that it could come with a small, sealed container of starter fluid to be applied when opened, or at least made explicitly clear that a second purchase is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fill easily and light at first try.
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper versions out there. But I tried 2 different cheaper ones. First one doesn't fill; leaks profusely. Second one does work, but not well. So unless lower price is the first priority, get a nicer one that will fill easily and light on first try. I love this model.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zheng

customer_reviews.title: It was EASY to use and worked great
customer_reviews.text: It was EASY to use and worked great! I used it to make a Honey-Baked Ham and it was clearly the hit of the food table! Now, I have a new holiday tradition. It will work great on desserts, too! Well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Defective, TINY and OVER PRICED
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting—- would work and this is not user error —- plain defective and not working. Smh! When we spend money on a product the expectation is that it will deliver value.
customer_reviews.author: CNN

customer_reviews.title: Great torch
customer_reviews.text: Loving this torch! The design and color are awesome. I do have a hard time getting it to start, the button on the back is very picky! I find that if you push towards the bottom half of the button it starts right away or at least by the 2nd and third try. Once it starts its a great torch, we've been using it for creme brûlée. It comes with a stand and filling the torch was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa N

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, very easy to use and works great. I only wish the instructions were a little more user friendly. Overall, more than happy though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good product
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s German made, not sure. Works great. Owned two of them. I like how easy and simple to use. To many child locks though, but needed I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use it for creme Brûlée. Never got it work! Better off getting one from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Wirtjo Leonard

customer_reviews.title: From my research this appears to be the best one. Be sure to buy butane when you ...
customer_reviews.text: From my research this appears to be the best one. Be sure to buy butane when you buy this torch. It's excellent for roasting the skins on chilies, which is the reason I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: ... well made but not as powerful as I would like. It feels good in my hands and is ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made but not as powerful as I would like. It feels good in my hands and is the right size to handle well in the kitchen. Honestly, I believe I would probably use my benzomatic torch more as I find I value the power more than the design. That said, this product does perform well although it takes more time to sear than my benzomatic torch.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic hand held size. Some of the ones I saw were very chunky - this one fits nicely in my hand. I like the design and on initial use seems to be very robust. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen tool for our aspiring baker and chef
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, comfortable to hold, very good safety features to satisfy any parent, and it does the job beautifully. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to go pyro... I mean provide a succulent finish to desserts, onion soups, crepes, and even French toast. It's amazing what you can torch... I mean embellish with a tool that easily crisps up any sugars, cheeses, meat or fish. :) It is very safe, stable and easy to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Torch away!
customer_reviews.text: I researched many torches to finds quality easy to use kitchen torch for my 12 year old baker. Not only was it safe to use but my daughter and I was able to operate it in no time. She uses it for everything now and really loves it. It's her favorite kitchen tool now and I love the fact that it's compact and easy to store. Safe to use and comes with a sturdy stand.
customer_reviews.author: Namphuongb

customer_reviews.title: Slow leaks occur over time
customer_reviews.text: Very nice torch until it starts to slow leak, then it's useless and just wastes Butane and creates a hazard, at this price point I'd expect it to last near a lifetime with how infrequent usage we give it....
customer_reviews.author: AJ5

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth the price for the solid construction and excellent warranty. Would have gone through way more in ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this torch for 6 years and it is still going strong. Completely worth the price for the solid construction and excellent warranty. Would have gone through way more in cheap torches in the same time period had I not invested in one of these.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Great torch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great torch that has a lock feature and is really easy to use. I used to have this much cheaper torch and I didn't make creme brulée often enough to justify buying an expensive one. However, after my other torch died after only a year of limited use I just decided to splurge a bit. Totally worth the money. I can't even believe how much better it is. It lights on the first light, locks into place, you can hold it with one hand and it carmelizes the sugar quickly and evenly. I made 12 servings of creme brulee for our family holiday party and it was awesome :)
customer_reviews.author: meiks

customer_reviews.title: A no-fail tool. Bring on the Creme Brûlée---not a problem with this torch!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect kitchen torch--if you're into making Creme Bruleé, or just want to highlight the meringue on your lemon pie. This is a sturdy, wonderful tool! Rosle products, in general are extremely high performance quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Collage707

customer_reviews.title: Great Wife Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wife Loves it, she uses it alot well made easy to use
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, not hard to handle on the hand and it can control the flame nice design with good color
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Stylish device!!
customer_reviews.text: Not that anyone really sees what you use in the kitchen; this torch's quality (10 yr warranty) is its best feature but its almost equaled by its aesthetics. Definitely the best torch in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Ptricky

customer_reviews.title: Finicky torch, but very good when it works
customer_reviews.text: I like it when it works, but I seem to have to refill it each time I use it, even if it's only for a few seconds of use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Steele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. A top quality torch that I trust to work defect free for many years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best torch I have ever used. Excellent flame control and features.
customer_reviews.author: R. McClusky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the white clean look of this and works well.
customer_reviews.author: NTK

customer_reviews.title: Leaks butane
customer_reviews.text: The torch is solidly built and feels substantial, but it doesn't reliably light (I've taken to lighting it using my gas range) and it's evidently leaking butane, since every time I open the cupboard where it's stored I can smell the fuel. Also, it's difficult to fill without losing a lot of fuel in the process.
customer_reviews.author: RJSF

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, light weight, and gets the job done quickly. Has a nice safety switch so you have to flip a switch before you can click the trigger, since this thing is a powerful torch. Has a nice adjustment to hold the flame even if you take finger off trigger button or you can set it to just shoot the flame while you hold the button. Has a low/high slider for how much fire you need.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great for dabs ;)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dabs. The fill lasts forever, and the quality is awesome compared to Bonjour's crap. Good german made torch!
customer_reviews.author: DAT

customer_reviews.title: a beauty in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: decide to go for Rosle compare to others is its design. beside function, i want a a clean & nice design torch. used it twice to make my daughter's favorite S+P scallion beef sushi. she said it taste better the one we had in HK. looking forward to create more dishes w/it.
customer_reviews.author: JST

customer_reviews.title: Works Great...easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Easy to load with lighter fluid, starts every time, and the hold and safety features are great. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great torch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this torch. It's versatile, easy to operate, has a Greta stand soon burnt hands or counters and an adjustable flame. I used it to glaze my honey ham for Christmas and it performed like a champ (better than the year I tried using my husbands big torch & had to refinish some cabinets..whoops!). I also used it for meringues and for creme brûlée. I couldn't find fine sugar (my bad sent my hubby to the store so wadda ya expect) so I had to use granulated sugar, which is harder to crystallize and it was perfect. The shell was crackin' good and a perfect contrast to the custard. Highly recommend this versatile kitchen torch.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda M. Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, so I can't speak to it usage.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for an amateur cook! Nice strong flame. Only had it for one month, used it about four times and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: kamana

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Found it in our local Sur la Table but this price was much cheaper! We use the item to make desserts and never run out of butane during the process (and we're always making for 5 or more).
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Locke

customer_reviews.title: Best Torch Available for Dabbing
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research before purchasing this torch but after I got to test it out upon arrival I knew it was top notch. Top quality and finish. Great for the concentrate enthusiast that needs to heat up a titanium nail. Stay dabbing my friends
customer_reviews.author: Scissors42

customer_reviews.title: Came without butane - wtf?!
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that it didn't start out of the box it's pretty nice. I had to fill it with butane which is why I'm docking 3 stars - come on it should ship fully loaded ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: DJ3000

product_meta.title: Rösle Crème Brulee Butane/Propane Adjustable Kitchen Torch
product_meta.description: Located in the Bavaria region of Germany, family- owned Rosle has been steadily creating the best tools and utensils in the world since 1888. Each Rosle product joins design and function in perfect harmony. 18/10 stainless steel is used in production providing a professional utensil that is not only aesthetically pleasing, but hygienic, neutral to flavors and odors and easy to clean. During the development phase - which lasts from 1 to 2 years on average - each product goes through a trial period where it is critically evaluated by cooking schools and professional chefs. During production, Rosle utensils go through an elaborate manufacturing processes and only leave the premises after passing strict quality control. Professional and home chefs alike sing the praise of this integrated collection, widely recognized as the best on the market. With German design and unrivaled material, Rosle continues to receive prestigious design prizes and a growing list of awards. The team at Rosle has thought of everything when designing this torch. With a temperature up to 2372 degrees F, this torch will quickly caramelize the top of a crème brulee without warming the custard. Can be used for roasting peppers and removing the skin from tomatoes. It is safe and easy to use: it has an adjustable gas dial to regulate flame size and a child resistant safety switch for an important added safety feature. The 0.04 qt gas reservoir guarantees up to 60 minutes of operation with a continuous flame. A sturdy stand provides convenient storage and protects gas intake valve from crumbs and debris. Appliance is empty on delivery, easy to fill with commonly available lighter gas (butane/propane), GS and TUV approved. Lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Torch temperature goes up to 2372 degrees F
Ideal for caramelizing creme brulee or roasting peppers
Features an adjustable gas dial to regulate flame size and a child resistant safety switch
.04 Qt gas reservoir guarantees up to 60 minutes of operation with a continuous flame
Appliance is empty on delivery, easy to fill with commonly available lighter gas (butane/propane), Lifetime warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars405 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
